metadata.title: CVE-2019-10051 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Suricata 4.1.3. If the functionfiletracker_newchunk encounters an unsafe "Some(sfcm) => { ft.new_chunk }"item, then the program enters an smb/files.rs error condition and crashes.

criterions.comment: suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
